model_solution:
The reflection of the point $(3,4)$ in the $x$-axis has $x$-coordinate 3 and $y$-coordinate $-4$.
The coordinates of the image of the point $(3,4)$ after its reflection in the $x$-axis are $(3,-4)$.
The reflection of the point $(3,4)$ in the $x$-axis has $x$-coordinate 3 and $y$-coordinate $-4$.
